name: DotPigeon, 1978 NFTs. Series 2. #013
description: Thirteenth card in series of 13. Collect #8 through #13 to receive #15 via airdrop. Collect #1-13 to receive #14 chase award via airdrop. ******** digital capture of original painting, gouache on vintage baseball card, 2021. *****  DotPigeon granted permission for use of Balaclava Guy character in this artwork.  ******* NFT image is for personal use, no commercial rights are granted. Twitter @thr33som3s and IG @thr33somes to see upcoming cards and new series. ************ ALL editions in Series 2 will have FUTURE FUNCTIONALITY.  Collect them now to use them later! thr33som3s are timeless, yet each little detail can connect one to another in the future.
